features: 【Upgrade Universal Headrest Attachment】It's a new design headrest pillow for most kinds of office chair, makes your chair more comfortable. Adjustable height & Angle Upholstered Headrest, Ergonomic design provides support for your head and neck.
【Premium Material】The chair headrest attachment use advanced black breathable mesh & premium elastic sponge & high-quality nylon which is comfortable, strong and durable.

【No Punch Installation】Came with free installation tools. 3 different sizes fastener for no punch installation. For 0.6-0.75 inch backrest, please use 0.87 inch fastener; For 0.75-0.91 inch backrest, please use 1.02 inch fastener; For 0.91-1.06 inch backrest, please use 1.18 inch fastener.

【Wide Compatibility】The headrest is compatible with most of backrest, such as wood or plastic, please measure the thickness of the backrest before purchasing. If your backrest is too thick, please use screws to install.

【High Quality and Service】 Our universal chair headrest are made of premium quality material. Besides, we provide 365 days after-sales service for all products. For any questions or product problems, welcome to contact our professional & 24 hours online services team.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: It is a universal headrest attachment, office chair is not included. We spend almost 8 hours (and more) to work in our office every day. Working in comfortable and relaxing environment will help us to achieve higher efficiency. A simple headrest attachment to your office chair will instantly appreciate heightened support for your neck,back,shoulders. You'll immediately feel a SENSE OF RELIEF as this specially designed headrest catches the weight of your head. Adjustable Height & Angle Upholstered Headrest, Ergonomic design provides support for your head or neck ,it helps to avoid backache, neckache, waistache and working comfortably for a whole day.
Notice: It's just a universal chair headrest attachment, chair is not included.

Specification: Product Name:Chair Headrest Materials:Sponge+ plastic+Nylon Size: ‎27 x 25 x 14 cm; Color:Black Weight:1030g About Installation: We offer three fixing clips.you can choose suitable one according to your chairs. 1,The backrest thickness is less than 0.6-0.75 inch, suitable for 0.87 inch fixing clips; 2,The backrest thickness is between 0.75-0.91 inch, suitable for 1.02 inch fixing clips; 3,The backrest thickness is less than 0.91-1.06 inch, suitable for 1.18 inch fixing clips. Package Included: 1x headrest 1x Mesh Fabric 3x Pairs of different sizes fasteners 8x Flat screws 1x Spanner 1x Anti-slip sticker 6x Screw mats 4x Self-tapping screws Note: 1,The headrest is only designed for solid backrest frame,such as wood or plastic,not suitable for curved or thick(over 1.06 inch) chair-back. please measure the thickness of the backrest before purchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits my Steelcase Amia
reviews.reviewText: This headrest is a game changer. Sucks that some people couldn't make it work for their chairs. It works perfectly for mine. I also like the mobility of the headrest, It adjusts very easily. Comfy and east to install. Quality seems alright but It comes with a 2 year warranty so that's good. 👌🏾

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheaper than buying a whoe new chair!
reviews.reviewText: I was debating whether to get an entire new office chair with a built-in headrest, but had some misgivings about spending $. Saw this with a 15% coupon which made the price even more attractive and gave it a shot.What's in the box:==============It comes with 2 different sized brackets made to accommodate the the thickness of your chair as well as the appropriate screws sized in length to do the same. You also have the option to screw into your chair directly. Also comes with what they called a 'non-slip' strip which on touching it is not really sticky at all, but maybe for the purpose of clamping this down to your chair it is. Lastly a square piece of mesh cloth to place on the area where you will be mounting the headrest.Assembly=======Pretty simple. Attach non-slip strip to your chair, attach the appropriately sized bracket to the headrest using the right-sized screws, loosely attach the headrest over the mesh cloth and tighten.Cons:====It's really hard to tell if this unit is a good fit for your chair based on the curvature of back as illustrated in the listing. I think it would help if they had a picture someone sitting in an non-compatible chair so we can get a better idea if it will fit yours. It should also be noted that adjustments to this headrest is limited only to adjusting the height. You cannot adjust it forward or backwards.Summary=======Overall a decent buy, but make sure to set some level of limited expectations with respect to chair compatibility and the ability to adjust it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The head rest broke after couple months of use . When trying to adjust the height of the headrest the little square that you push to do the adjustment came out flying . Turns out the screw that holds the square and the spring together broke off inside the plastics piece and there is no way to remove the remaining piece to replace with another screw . Pretty disappointing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my office chair working long hours with neck pain. Works great , easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sits a little too far forward
reviews.reviewText: If you have a chair that you use to recline back, this headrest works great. But for anyone who has to sit upright, the headrest is just too far forward. There is no way adjust how far it sits forward, only up and down and a tilt on the cushion itself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't come forward enough
reviews.reviewText: With multiple people saying it pushes their head too far forward, I was actually hopeful for this, but I guess my chair is built different from theirs. I wanted support to rest my head against while just sitting at my computer, but the only way my head rests against this is if lean my head all the way back until I'm fully double chinning, or lean back in my chair to stare at the ceiling. Sitting up straight in my chair, there's 4-5 inches between the back of my head and the headrest, which kind of defeats the purpose of purchasing something to supply head/neck support. Not sure if it's worth keeping

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Steelcase Leap V2
reviews.reviewText: This headrest is exceptional and provides great head support in my Steelcase Leap V2. However, I had to tweak the installation slightly to ensure it stays securely in place. I used the grip installation method (without drilling any holes) but the included piece of cloth was too slippery to use as shown in the instructions. Instead, I used 2 strips of black "grip premium" drawer liner from Home Depot (the one that is made of very soft rubber and has square holes in a checkered pattern). With these strips under the metal brackets the grip is very strong. You can then attach the included piece of cloth to the front of the brackets with a double sided tape to neatly hide them. The final result is very elegant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good solution until a new chair can be purchased. Provides adequate head rest.

reviews.reviewTitle: Neck rest that helps hold up my heavy head when I'm sore
reviews.reviewText: ECOSI Chair Headrest,Office Chair Head Rest Attachment Adjustable Height & Angle Upholstered Headrest with Elastic Sponge & Nylon Frame for Ergonomic High Swivel Executive Chair,Chair Not IncludedThis could be a money saver IF it works for your chair.If you're looking to extend the comfort of your existing desk chair without a whole lot of money buying a new chair, maybe this could work.I was looking for a new chair with a head rest. But my chair is pretty comfortable so just replacing the entire chair seemed silly. I found this and thought I would give this a shot ....Firstly it is an easy install. Comes with three different brackets to accommodate various chair sizes and thicknesses. ... You simply bolt it on. You also do have option to screw it on with self tapping screws but most likely you won't want to do that. For my chair the bracket and bolt fastened just fine and tight.In terms of comfort , this is where maybe not everyone will like it. For my use I have to adjust the neck height lowest. It sits right at my neck top base and I can sit back and let the head rest just hold my head up. It is exactly what I needed when I have sore neck and I could barely hold my own head up during work. However, depending on your body and need and the type of chair you have, some may find this sticks out too far out and that might be annoying for some.Overall for 45$, it is a great chair mod and saves me from buying a new chair. I personally like it .
Si adatta bene facile da montare robusto ottima qualità prezzo

reviews.reviewTitle: una solución para mi dolor de cuello
reviews.reviewText: Este tipo de reposacabezas me lo recomendó mi masajista y estoy bastante contenta, porque funciona. ya no noto esa tensión incomoda en el cuello y hombros. Recomiendo el articulo
Preis/Leistung sehr in Ordnung. Die Kopfstütze kann geklemmt (breiter oder schmaler Rahmen der Rückenlehne) oder auch festgeschraubt werden. Montagematerial entsprechend ausreichend vorhanden.
Fais le travail, mais très fragile, dans la durée ?
